metadata.description: Memorandum for President Osmeña from Major General Basilio J. Valdes regarding policy for the separation from the Philippine Army of officers and men who served in any capacity during the Japanese regime dated 24 May 1945
metadata.subject: Basilio Valdes; World War II; Military; official papers; memorandum
metadata.title: Memorandum for President Osmeña regarding policy for the separation from the Philippine Army of officers and men who served in any capacity during the Japanese regime
